All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssignReinforcements
The AssignReinforcements class handles the reinforcement phase of the game.
AssignReinforcementsTest
Unit tests for the AssignReinforcements class.
Continent
 
ContinentContext
 
ContinentImpl
Implementation of the Continent interface, representing a continent in the game map.
Country
 
CountryAssignment
Handles the assignment of countries to players in the game.
CountryContext
 
CountryImpl
Implementation of the Country interface.
Deploy
The Deploy class represents a deploy order where a player moves a specific number of troops to a target territory they own.
Edit
The Edit class represents an abstract phase where the game can be modified.
End
The End class represents the phase where the game ends.
GameContext
 
GameDriver
The GameDriver class serves as the entry point for the game.
GameEngine
GameEngine class represents the main controller of the game.
GameEngineTest
Unit test for GameEngine class.
InvalidMapFileException
 
IssueOrder
The IssueOrder class represents the phase where players issue their orders.
IssueOrderTest
Unit tests for the IssueOrder class.
MainPlay
The MainPlay class represents the abstract base class for main gameplay phases.
MapComponent
 
MapContext
 
MapFileReader
 
NeighborContext
 
Order
 
OrderExecution
The OrderExecution class represents the phase where issued orders are executed.
OverallFactory
Factory class for creating Continent and Country objects.
Phase
The Phase class represents the abstract base class for different phases in the game.
Play
The Play class represents an abstract phase in the game where the main gameplay occurs.
Player
 
PlayerContext
 
PlayerImpl
The PlayerImpl class represents a player in the game, implementing the Player interface.
PostLoad
The PostLoad class represents the phase after loading a map.
PreLoad
The PreLoad class represents the phase before loading a map.
Startup
The Startup class represents the initial phase of the game.
ValidateMap
 
ValidateMapImpl
Implementation of the ValidateMap interface.
ValidateMapImplTest
This class tests all the methods in the ValidateMapImpl class.
